scripts.cap:dev:local:android: env-cmd -f .env.dev.local react-scripts build && npx cap copy && npx cap update && npx cap sync --inline && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:dev:local:ios: env-cmd -f .env.dev.local react-scripts build && npx cap copy && npx cap update && npx cap sync --inline && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:dev:noAndroidStudio: env-cmd -f .env.dev react-scripts build && npx cap copy && npx cap update && npx cap sync --inline
scripts.cap:dev:local:noAndroidStudio: env-cmd -f .env.dev.local react-scripts build && npx cap copy && npx cap update && npx cap sync --inline
scripts.electron:prepare:start: npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap copy @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.electron:start: yarn electron:prepare:start && cd electron && npm run electron:start
scripts.electron:prepare:dev: yarn build:dev && npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap copy @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.electron:publish:dev:local: yarn cap:dev:local:noAndroidStudio && npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap copy @capacitor-community/electron && cd electron && npm run electron:make
scripts.electron:publish:dev: yarn electron:install && yarn electron:prepare:dev && yarn cap:dev:noAndroidStudio && npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap copy @capacitor-community/electron && cd electron && npm run electron:make
